snippet: A federal agent said he became convinced that the person behind the Silk Road black-market website was Mark Karpeles, operator of the world’s largest Bitcoin exchange.
abstract: Testimony in trial of Ross W Ulbricht, man accused of narcotics trafficking on black-market website Silk Road, reveals that Ulbricht mistakenly believed that site was run by Mark Karpeles, owner of world's largest Bitcoin exchange; belief resulted in Karpeles being targeted by federal investigation.

byline.original: By BENJAMIN WEISER and NATHANIEL POPPER

lead_paragraph: A federal agent said he became convinced that the person behind the Silk Road black-market website was Mark Karpeles, operator of the world’s largest Bitcoin exchange.

headline.main: Focus Is on Bitcoin Trader at Trial Over Silk Road Black Market
headline.print_headline: Focus Is on Bitcoin Trader at Trial Over Black Market
